ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces amaro liqueur (such as Fernet BrancaÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce espresso liqueur (such as Galliano RistrettoÂ®)
des: "To make this signature cocktail, stir Fernet BrancaÂ® and Galliano RistrettoÂ® with lemon juice and simple syrup. Garnish with a little fresh mint. This flavorful herbal drink is a signature cocktail at Cure in New Orleans."
ins: Pour amaro liqueur, lemon juice, simple syrup, and espresso liqueur into a highball glass; fill glass with ice. Swizzle cocktail with a bar spoon and garnish with mint.
